article_headline: 5살 애가 십분앉아 있더니 바로 스르륵 잠들었음
article_content: 크고튼튼 세탁잘되니 오염무섭지 않음

Great for outdoor seating.

It is decently comfortable, but not super comfortable.

Quality is good, it is study and robust. Literally takes 2 sec to assemble.

Much larger than I had initially envisioned.

I bought this with the mindset of using it in the living room alongside other chairs. However, it stood out as too chunky and large. I placed it outside on our enclosed balcony. Perfect chair for that spot.
